channel.title: Mini Devlog on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mini Devlog on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Totems of Tag
item.description: Welcome to another devlog about a “One Week Game”! (Which are, unsurprisingly, games completely developed in a single week.

item.title: I Wish You Good Hug
item.description: Welcome to my “devlog” or “What I’ve Learned” for my latest game: Huggy Bastard. Because the Play Store doesn’t like it when you use the word “bastard” in kid-friendly games, I decided to change the name to I Wish You Good Hug on most platforms/websites.

item.title: A Recipe For Disaster
item.description: Last week, I created A Recipe For Disaster. A couch co-op game for 1-4 players, for literally all ages and skill levels, about running a bakery.
